meanings: (힘·세력 등이) weak, feeble, light; (바람 등이) gentle

meanings.meaning: have a soft spot for somebody/something

vlive.korean: 타이틀이 좀 약하다? You think the title track was not strong enough? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : IZ X Rooftop Live - 아이즈의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: You think the title track was not strong enough?

vlive.korean: 언니! - 약하다 약하다. Yujeong. - That's weak. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [아육대] 육즙이 퍼지네 온몸으로 퍼지네🤤 고기 좀 먹을 줄 아는 언니들의 육방🥩2탄!
약하다 - 약해요? That's weak. - Weak? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 월요요정들이 왔어요🧚‍♀️💕
약하다. - 약하다. That's weak. - That's not enough. 듣기 View video PeekaVoo! : [Full]MYTEEN's FAN MEETING LIVE - 마이틴의 팬미팅라이브!
한 입 약하다, 약해. That's too weak. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : A-DAILY - 에이데일리 '즐거운 가을 소풍!!'

examples.korean: He has very little sight in his right eye. 발음듣기 그는 오른쪽 눈이 시력이 아주 약하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has very little sight in his right eye. 발음

examples.korean: She is still weak after her illness. 발음듣기 그녀는 아프고 난 후로 아직도 몸이 약하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is still weak after her illness. 발음

examples.korean: That bridge is too weak for heavy traffic. 발음듣기 저 다리는 무거운 차량들이 다니기에는 너무 약하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That bridge is too weak for heavy traffic. 발음

examples.korean: to have a weak heart 발음듣기 심장이 약하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to have a weak heart 발음

examples.korean: Our boss is extremely susceptible to flattery. 발음듣기 우리 상사는 아첨에 매우 약하다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: Our boss is extremely susceptible to flattery. 발음
